sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
  section.splitCont
    h2.hl--lv2--splitCont {{hl}}
    dl.splitCont__txtArea
      dt {{ttl}}
      <slot name="listArea"></slot>
      dd {{txt}}
    div.splitCont__img
</template>

<!-- Add "scoped" attribute to limit CSS to this component only -->
<style scoped lang="scss">
  .splitCont{
    width: 70%;
    max-width: 42rem;
    margin: auto;
    & + .splitCont{
      margin-top: 8rem;
    }
    &__img{
      background: #ddd;
      height: 200px;
      width: 100%;
    }
    &__txtArea{
    }
    .hl--lv2--splitCont{
      margin-left: -1.25rem;

      letter-spacing: 10px;
      font-size: 60px;
      margin-top: 4rem;
      color: #ccc;
    }
  }
  // 下層はメニュー縮める、コンテンツ横にスライド＋フェード

</style>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'splitCont',
  props:{
    class:{type:String},
    hl:{type:String},
    ttl:{type:String},
    txt:{type:String},
  }
}
</script>
